channel.title: Microsoft-graph-community-calls on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft-graph-community-calls on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft Graph community call -- June 2021
item.description: This month’s community call features presentations on Assignment Graph API (v1.

item.title: Microsoft Graph community call -- May 2021
item.description: This month’s community call features presentations on Application Consent Deep Dive (demystifying permissions and consent when accessing Microsoft Graph) and on Considerations for Creating Online Meetings (Integration into Outlook or into other 3^rd^ party experiences).

item.title: Microsoft Graph community call - April 6th, 2021
item.description: Hosted by Nik Charlebois, this month’s call covered topics including the Microsoft Graph Java SDK version 3, project Kiota and an overview of what’s new with the Microsoft Graph Toolkit.
